content.question: The image provides evidence for which of the following social changes?

choices.label: The expansion of voting rights to working-class men
The expanding efforts of charities to provide financial assistance to people living in poverty
The growing influence of the feminist movement

content.answer: The expansion of voting rights to working-class men

topic.text: 6.7: Ideologies of Change and Reform Movements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
